Plot SuRE results across SNP groups

Source: R/SURE.R
SURE.plot.Rd

Plot SuRE results across SNP groups

SURE.plot(
  sure.melt,
  snp_groups = c("GWAS lead", "UCS", "Consensus"),
  comparisons_filter = function(x) {     if ("Consensus" %in% x)          return(x) },
  title = "SuRE MPRA",
  xlabel = "SNP Group",
  facet_formula = ". ~ Cell_type",
  show_padj = T,
  show_signif = T,
  vjust_signif = 0.5,
  show_plot = T,
  save_path = F,
  height = 5,
  width = 5
)

Source

Publication GitHub Full SuRE data SNP-SuRE data browse

See also

Other SURE: SURE.melt_snp_groups(), SURE.merge()

Examples

sure.melt <- data.table::fread("/sc/arion/projects/pd-omics/brian/Fine_Mapping/Data/GWAS/Nalls23andMe_2019/_genome_wide/SURE/Nalls23andMe_2019.SURE.snp_groups.mean.csv.gz")

#> Error in data.table::fread("/sc/arion/projects/pd-omics/brian/Fine_Mapping/Data/GWAS/Nalls23andMe_2019/_genome_wide/SURE/Nalls23andMe_2019.SURE.snp_groups.mean.csv.gz"): File '/sc/arion/projects/pd-omics/brian/Fine_Mapping/Data/GWAS/Nalls23andMe_2019/_genome_wide/SURE/Nalls23andMe_2019.SURE.snp_groups.mean.csv.gz' does not exist or is non-readable. getwd()=='/Users/schilder/Desktop/echolocatoR/docs/reference'
pb <- SURE.plot(sure.melt=sure.melt)

#> Error in subset(sure.melt, SNP_group %in% snp_groups): object 'sure.melt' not found
